## utils.getScrollDeltaPixels() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use Blockly.browserEvents.getScrollDeltaPixels instead.
> 

Returns the scroll delta of a mouse event in pixel units.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getScrollDeltaPixels(e: WheelEvent): {
    x: number;
    y: number;
};
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | WheelEvent | Mouse event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ x: number; y: number; }

Scroll delta object with .x and .y properties.
